title: Speed Laws
text: Drivers must drive at a speed that is reasonable and prudent given the traffic, visibility, and roadway conditions.

title: Traffic Signals
text: Drivers must obey traffic signals, including green, yellow, and red lights.

title: Right-of-Way
text: Drivers must yield the right-of-way to pedestrians and other vehicles in certain situations.

question: What are the penalties for speeding?
answer: The penalties for speeding vary depending on the speed and other factors, but may include fines and points on your license.

question: What should I do if I get a traffic ticket?
answer: If you receive a traffic ticket, you have several options, including pleading guilty, pleading not guilty, or attending traffic school.
